brief.content-text:
Diagram 3, Image

The diagram depicts the printer windows available through the control panel inside the Windows OS. A printer has been selected from the available printers and the print queue is selected. From within the Print Queue window, the Properties option has been selected and the properties that pertain to that printer are displayed. Some of the main options tabs available from inside the Properties window are as follows: General, Sharing, Ports, Advanced, Color Management, Paper Size Settings, Advanced Options, and Accessories.
